#Colon Adenocarcinoma C4349
```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg',filters='NCIT:C4349',
                  codematches=T)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq, chrom = 5)
```
